directions: Place fish in a shallow dish and rub with olive oil, lime juice and salt and pepper. Cover and leave at room temperature 2 hours.
Heat grill to medium-high. Grill fish 4 minutes on each side. Combine mayonnaise, capers and lemon juice. Serve fish on bed of mixed greens and top with mayonnaise mixture.
ingredients: 6 (6 ounce) mahi mahi fillets (or other firm white fish)
1 (4 ounce) jar Crosse & Blackwell® Capers, rinsed and drained
title: Grilled Mahi Mahi with Lemon Caper Sauce
